text.text: A New Way of Making Websites
text.styles: mt-2 relative z-10 max-w-3xl text-3xl leading-8 font-extrabold tracking-tight text-gray-900 lg:mx-auto

text.text: We are revolutionizing the world of small business web design and development with our cutting-edge page builder that offers an affordable, all-in-one website solution for businesses like yours. Our platform eliminates the need for hand coding by providing easy-to-use tools for creating and customizing websites, while still delivering the high-quality design and functionality that your business needs to succeed online.
text.styles: mt-4 relative z-10 max-w-2xl text-xl text-gray-600 lg:mx-auto
